definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: They rode over to see us last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期他们骑马来探望我们。

sentences.english: I saw his pay stub last week.
sentences.chinese: 我上星期看到了他的工资单。

sentences.english: Tugce I read about you in the weekly Inter newsletter.
sentences.chinese: 我上星期在国米网站上看了关于你的报道。

sentences.english: The closure was announced last week as the paper was caught up in a phone hacking scandal.
sentences.chinese: 该集团因电话窃听门而于上星期宣布关闭。

sentences.english: The weather girl batted.900 last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期气象报告女播音员的正确率达90%。

sentences.english: He was on the carpet last week for for being lconsumed to work three times.
sentences.chinese: 上星期，他由于早退三次而遭到月旦。

sentences.english: I'm afraid our football team was really plastered  last week.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我们的足球队上星期真的被打得落花流水。

sentences.english: Last week, I just celebrated my eleven-year-old birthday.
sentences.chinese: 上星期，我刚刚庆祝了我的十一岁生日。

sentences.english: He was rushed to hospital last week after suffering a collapsed lung.
sentences.chinese: 上星期，他因出现肺萎陷而被火速送进医院。

sentences.english: The Smiths paid a friendly visit to China last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期史密斯夫妇对中国进行了友好访问。

sentences.english: It happened that I won the football lottery last week.
sentences.chinese: 我上星期偶然中了足彩。

sentences.english: Last week Mrs . Mills went to London.
sentences.chinese: 上星期米而夫人去了伦敦。

sentences.english: Oh, you should have tasted the white chocolate cake she made last week.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，你真是应该尝尝上星期她做的白巧克力蛋糕。

sentences.english: He was in very low water when I saw him last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期我见到他时他“手头”正紧。

sentences.english: These oranges are inferior to those I bought last week.
sentences.chinese: 这些桔子没我上星期买的好。

sentences.english: Last week there was a swimming match between Dong Fang Junior School and my school.
sentences.chinese: 上星期有一个游泳比赛东方中学，我的学校。
